definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: It can also be used to measure the resolving power of offset plates.
sentences.chinese: 他还可以用来测定柯式印版的解像度。

sentences.english: Click on image to get higher resolution.
sentences.chinese: 点击图片得到更高的解像度。

sentences.english: Q11 What is the recommended screen resolution for viewing the system?
sentences.chinese: 要浏览本系统，建议的萤幕解像度为何？

sentences.english: Later satellites in the series probably will have improved resolution.
sentences.chinese: 本系列的其他卫星可能有更高的解像度。

definition: standard definition (TV or video image quality)
